270.title: Adventure Comics, no. 491
270.author: Otto Binder, script ; Al Plastino, art
270.appears_in: 12 p. in Adventure Comics, no. 247 (Apr. 1958) ; edited reprint in Superman Annual, no. 6 (Winter 1963) ; reprinted in DC Special Blue Ribbon Digest, no. 1 (Mar./Apr. 1980) ; reprinted in Adventure Comics, no. 491 (Sept. 1982) ; reprinted in Adventure Comics 247 (DC Silver Age Classics, 1992) ; reprinted in The Legion of Super-Heroes Archives, no. 1 ; reprinted in Adventure Comics no. 247 (Millennium Edition, 2000).
notes: Summary: Superboy meets three super-youths from the 30th century (Cosmic Boy, Lightning Boy (later to be called Lightning Lad), and Saturn Girl), who invite him to the future to join their club.
Data from Bob Cherry, Gene Reed, Lou Mougin, et al., via Grand Comics Database Project.
